title: U.S. Reaches In-Principle China Deal, Huawei’s Global Security System, Investing in ETFs
itunes:title: U.S. Reaches In-Principle China Deal, Huawei’s Global Security System, Investing in ETFs
description:
Andy Purdy, Chief Security Officer at Huawei Technologies USA, talks about the company’s global security system, and its impact on consumers and U.S markets. Bloomberg News Senior Trade Reporter Shawn Donnan walks through a Bloomberg scoop about the U.S. reaching an in-principle China deal. Jordan Farris, Head of ETFs at Nuveen, discusses investing in exchange traded funds. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber, shares his insight on how private equity has won big on Lululemon. And we Drive to the Close with Yana Barton, Equity Portfolio Manager at Eaton Vance.

Hosts: Carol Massar, Jason Kelly and Scarlet Fu. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
